Title: Relates to responsibility for cable bills after a disconnection or downgrade in service
Summary: Relates to responsibility for cable bills after a disconnection or downgrade in service; provides that customers requesting a disconnection or downgrade in service shall only be liable for services incurred up to the date the disconnection or downgrade is effective.
LawCode: Amd ยง224-b, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to responsibility for cable bills after a disconnection or downgrade in service
